creditline: This gift is donated in loving memory of Marty Abramson (1963-1993) by his wife, artist Aimee Orkin, friends and family.  Although his life ended short, his loving kindness, concern for humanity and humor impacted his community greatly.
medium: Cotton, marker, fabric inks, yarn, beads, buttons, ribbon, iron-on transfer, metallic threads, wood
title: Huppah
